channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for TN

item.title: Report I-2024070038

Report I-2024070038

  • City: Ozone
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: LOUDON COUNTY TRUCKING, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: The driver entered into a curve on the highway and according to the police report the driver left the roadway and connected the cable barrier, the driver over corrected and resulted in the trailer overtuming releasing its contents onto the surface of the highway and the soil in the center median.
